text.config.title: VillagerTweaks Configuration
text.config.option.enableMaxTradeOverrid: Whether to override the max trades of villagers. (Default: false)
text.config.option.maxTradesOverrideAmou: The maximum number of times a villager can trade a given item before they need to restock. Set to -1 for infinite trades. (Default: -1)
text.config.option.enableDemandBonus.des: When enabled, the demand modifier will increase the price of trades when a villager has been traded with a lot. (Default: true)
text.config.option.enableGlobalReputatio: When enabled, all players in a world will share the same reputation. (Default: false)
text.config.option.enableBadReputation.d: When enabled, negative actions such as hitting or killing villagers will affect your reputation. (Default: true)
text.config.option.forceVillagerConversi: When enabled, zombies will always convert villagers, regardless of the difficulty setting. (Default: false)
text.config.option.enableConversionTimeO: Whether to override the cure time of zombie villagers. If false, each zombie villager will have a random cure time like normal. (Default: false)
text.config.option.conversionTime.desc: The time (in ticks) it takes for a zombie villager to be cured. (Default: 3600)
text.config.option.displayConversionTime: Display the time until a zombie villager is cured. (Default: false)
text.config.option.enableEmeraldTemptati: Villagers will follow you if you hold an emerald ore block, deepslate emerald ore block, or emerald block. (Default: false)
